post.content_html:
Every CS:GO player wants to spice up their inventory with some sick new skins. And guess what? Our team is down with that too! So, we’re hyped to invite you to join the Legacy giveaway and get a chance to score some prizes by doing easy tasks. So, let’s get into the deets on how to win and what kind of awesome loot you could snag.

In article you will find:

  • What’s New?
  • All Info About The Legacy Giveaway
  • Gut Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN)
  • AWP | BOOM (MW)
  • AK-47 | Nightwish (MW)
  • M4A1-S | Player Two (FT)
  • USP-S | Cortex (FN)
  • Desert Eagle | Naga (MW)
  • Mystery Of CS:GO 2 Case by Hellcase
  • Wrapping Up!

What’s New?

Our giveaway will run from April 14 to May 4 with 120 prizes. You could be one of the lucky winners! To access the giveaway, click the “giveaway” button at the top of the Hellcase homepage.

Log in to the event page if you want to get in on the Legacy giveaway action. Here you can track when the giveaway is running, see what tasks you have to do, and check how many entries you’ve racked up so far.

Each task is worth a certain number of entries, with tougher tasks earning you more entries. The giveaway winners are chosen randomly, but the more entries you’ve got, the better your chances.

And let’s remember the skins we’ve got up for grabs! We’ve lined up some seriously dope rifles, pistols, knives, and gloves skins for our participants. So get in there and start completing those tasks because you never know. You could be the lucky winner walking away with some precious loot.

If you need further assistance with Hellcase giveaways, check out our guide on Gleam Giveaways .

All Info About The Legacy giveaway

The Legacy giveaway is the real deal – we’re giving away seven types of excellent skins worth $3,034. And get this – there will be 120 lucky winners, so your chances of scoring some sweet loot are pretty good.

You must act fast because this giveaway only runs from April 14 until May 4 (until 10 AM GMT). So cross your fingers that you’ll be one of the lucky winners.

Gut Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN)

The most expensive skin from this giveaway that you can get for free is Gut Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN) . Everyone dreams of having a cool knife that you can use for terrorists and counter-terrorists. This item is truly unique and, most importantly, incredibly beautiful. The knife shimmers with colors when viewed, making it truly mesmerizing. So don’t hesitate and participate in the giveaway to get Gut Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN).

AWP | BOOM (MW)

What about 5 AWP | BOOM (MW) for free? This time, we are giving away five AWP skins in our giveaway. Just like the knife, the AWP is versatile, and you can use it by both terrorists and counter-terrorists so that you can enjoy this skin throughout the match. In addition, it painted the skin with cool inscriptions like “BOOM” and “CRASH,” which capture the epicness of using this weapon. Therefore, you can get AWP | BOOM (MW) skin in our giveaway.

AK-47 | Nightwish (MW)

Wow, this is something. Check out a nice skin for AK-47. We will be giving away 7 of these. You can get AK-47 | Nightwish (MW) skin for free. All you have to do is participate in the giveaway. Nightwish has incredibly gorgeous colors, and playing as a terrorist with this weapon will be highly satisfying!

M4A1-S | Player Two (FT)

The game’s most popular device for Counter-Terrorists is M4A1-S, which is precisely why we’ve chosen the next skin we want to give you. Fifteen giveaway participants will receive free Player Two (FT) skin. It is one of the rare anime-style skins.

USP-S | Cortex (FN)

The next prize in our giveaway is USP-S | Cortex (FN) , or as most players like to call it, the “brains” skin. We’re giving this skin away to 20 lucky winners, and it features a painted skeleton whose brain has exploded, forming the letters USP. So grab this skin for free while you still can!

Desert Eagle | Naga (MW)

Thirty participants can receive a free Desert Eagle | Naga (MW) . The classic and understated style of the Desert Eagle will adorn your inventory. Take advantage of this opportunity, register for the giveaway, and earn points to increase your chances.

Mystery Of CS:GO 2 Case by Hellcase

Forty lucky giveaway winners get Mystery Of CS:GO 2 case for free, packed with great skins like M4A1-S | Player Two, AK-47 | Nightwish, Desert Eagle | Code Red, Glock-18 | Neo-Noir, USP-S | The Traitor, and a bunch more.

Wrapping Up!

Every CS:GO player is trying to make their collection look as great as possible with some sweet skins, right? The Legacy giveaway presents a remarkable chance to win a fantastic item as a prize. To boost your chances of winning, gather as many entries as possible. Furthermore, you can participate in other giveaways offered by Hellcase, which also provide equally valuable rewards. Trust us, you don’t wanna miss out on this one!
